entry.title: Seems like not many people are farming $SAFE although it looks like they might do a Season 2 Airdrop. You get points for organic usage based on: - you...
entry.summary: Seems like not many people are farming $SAFE although it looks like they might do a Season 2 Airdrop. You get points for organic usage based on: - your transaction count - transaction volume - $ amount of assets stored You can get up to a 2x multiplier if you lock $SAFE

entry.title: I think it's fair to say: Blast farmers did very well here. Large allocation and decent float as well. BLUR traders and holders got pretty rekt gettin...
entry.summary:
I think it's fair to say: Blast farmers did very well here. Large allocation and decent float as well. BLUR traders and holders got pretty rekt getting a tiny allocation and provided liquidity on NFTs that went down or holding $BLUR which went down as well.
DeFi Airdrops 🦇🔊: 17% of $BLAST will be airdropped tomorrow. $BLUR stakers will receive 3%. 7% to Blast point holders and 7% to Blast Gold holders. Top wallets will be vesting their airdrop.

entry.title: Re To be precise 1% will go to $BLUR traders and holders tomorrow. https://x.com/blur_io/status/1805631184028024909
entry.summary:
Re To be precise 1% will go to $BLUR traders and holders tomorrow. https://x.com/blur_io/status/1805631184028024909
Blur: The Blast Foundation allocated 3% of BLAST to the Blur Foundation. 1% will go to Blur traders and BLUR holders in Season 3 (0.5% each). 0.5% has been reserved for Blur traders in Season 4 (more details shared on June 26). 0.5% will be reserved for future use.

PSA: 5 days left to claim your Rabby points of Season 2. We think maximum 1 more season before they launch $RABBY If you don't use Rabby yet you might want to consider it. New users automatically get points based on their wallet balance pre-signup👇 https://rabby.io/points?code=DEFIAIRDROPSOG
Rabby Wallet: ⏰ Rabby Points Season 2 claim ends on June 30th at 23:59 (UTC+0). Only one week left to claim your points. Don't miss out! Open Rabby extension and go to "Rabby Points" to claim yours now.

entry.title: PSA: If you've farmed $ETHFI Season 2 you can decide where you want to claim the tokens on June 30th. Default is Ethereum but you can set it to Arbitr...
entry.summary: PSA: If you've farmed $ETHFI Season 2 you can decide where you want to claim the tokens on June 30th. Default is Ethereum but you can set it to Arbitrum if you want cheaper gas. Deadline to change the network is June 26th.
